languages.text: "Произвожу анализ... Утверждение ложно. Священные сборочные цеха нуждаются в машинном //исцелении//ремонте//, а не в дополнительных разрушениях". {n}Оптикон-22 упрямо склоняет голову.{/n}
"Analysing... This statement is false. The sacred assembly halls require machine //healing//repairs//, not further destruction." {n}Opticon-22 lowers his head in an unrelenting gesture.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Произвожу анализ... Утверждение ложно. Священные сборочные цеха нуждаются в машинном //исцелении//ремонте//, а не в дополнительных разрушениях". {n}Оптикон-22 упрямо склоняет голову.{/n}

languages.text: “正在分析……这种说法是错误的。神圣的集会大厅那些机器需要//治愈//修复//，而不是进一步的破坏。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号低下了头，做了个没有回旋余地的手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is false. The sacred assembly halls require machine //healing//repairs//, not further destruction." {n}Opticon-22 lowers his head in an unrelenting gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “正在分析……这种说法是错误的。神圣的集会大厅那些机器需要//治愈//修复//，而不是进一步的破坏。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号低下了头，做了个没有回旋余地的手势。{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Analyse... Cette déclaration est erronée. Les salles d'assemblage sacrées ont besoin de //soins//réparations// mécaniques, pas de destructions supplémentaires. » {n}Opticon-22 baisse la tête, implacable dans sa décision.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is false. The sacred assembly halls require machine //healing//repairs//, not further destruction." {n}Opticon-22 lowers his head in an unrelenting gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Analyse... Cette déclaration est erronée. Les salles d'assemblage sacrées ont besoin de //soins//réparations// mécaniques, pas de destructions supplémentaires. » {n}Opticon-22 baisse la tête, implacable dans sa décision.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「分析中…この主張は誤りです。神聖な集会場には、さらなる破壊ではなく、機械の//回復//修復//が必要です」{n}オプティコン-22は揺るぎない仕草で頭を下げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is false. The sacred assembly halls require machine //healing//repairs//, not further destruction." {n}Opticon-22 lowers his head in an unrelenting gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「分析中…この主張は誤りです。神聖な集会場には、さらなる破壊ではなく、機械の//回復//修復//が必要です」{n}オプティコン-22は揺るぎない仕草で頭を下げた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Analizando... Esa afirmación no es verdadera. Los salones de actos son sagrados y lo que requieren es que las máquinas sean //tratadas//reparadas//, no destruidas». {n}Opticon-22 agacha la cabeza en un gesto implacable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is false. The sacred assembly halls require machine //healing//repairs//, not further destruction." {n}Opticon-22 lowers his head in an unrelenting gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Analizando... Esa afirmación no es verdadera. Los salones de actos son sagrados y lo que requieren es que las máquinas sean //tratadas//reparadas//, no destruidas». {n}Opticon-22 agacha la cabeza en un gesto implacable.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Analysiere ... Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Die heiligen Produktionshallen benötigen //Heilung//Reparatur// von Maschinen, keine weitere Zerstörung." {n}Opticon-22 senkt den Kopf, eine unerbittliche Geste.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is false. The sacred assembly halls require machine //healing//repairs//, not further destruction." {n}Opticon-22 lowers his head in an unrelenting gesture.{/n}

traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Analiz ediliyor... Bu önerme yanlış. Kutsal montaj salonlarının makine //iyileştirmesine//onarımına// ihtiyacı var, daha fazla yıkıma değil." {n}Opticon-22, amansızca başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is false. The sacred assembly halls require machine //healing//repairs//, not further destruction." {n}Opticon-22 lowers his head in an unrelenting gesture.{/n}
